songs.title: Suitcase

description.plain: This song is a basic narration of a relationship that fell apart, like so many do. It was good, but couldn’t work out and that’s just how life goes.

songs.embed_content: Read “Suitcase” by Matthew Koma on Genius

album.full_title: The Cherrytree Sessions by Matthew Koma
album.name: The Cherrytree Sessions

body.plain: This song is a basic narration of a relationship that fell apart, like so many do. It was good, but couldn’t work out and that’s just how life goes.

songs.lyrics:
12 ContributorsSuitcase Lyrics[Verse 1]
You look like Sundays with my ex
Sit at breakfast with your arms across your chest
Like a cross she wore my trust around her neck
Till it hung her

My baby, she was clinically obsessed
Our identity was physical, but less
Every now and then her noise Inside my head re-enters

[Chorus]
She said I remember loving you all of the good shit
And all the bad shit too
I remember hating you
For all﻿ the right things you never tried to do
I remember needing you
Call me an addict, to your elastic moods
I'm packing every memory that we made
In a suitcase
[Verse 2]
You're on a train I used to wreck
With the bullets of the least of my respect
I wish there was a shot I could regret
But there isn't
Yea, there were tongues﻿ I spoke in heat
That I never meant to say, or meant to mean
In the shop or when I see her in my sleep in visions

[Chorus]
She said I remember loving you
All of the good shit and all the bad shit too
I remember hating you
For all﻿ the right things you never tried to do
I remember needing you
Call me an addict, to your elastic moods
I'm packing every memory that we made
In a suitcase

[Bridge]
I know you hate it when I say I'm sorry
But I'm sorry
Ohh
Ohh
Ohh
You might also like[Chorus]
She said I remember loving you
All of the good shit and all the bad shit too
I remember hating you
For all﻿ the right things you never tried to do
I remember needing you
Call me an addict, to your elastic moods
I'm packing every memory that we made
In a suitcase
In a suitcase

[Outro]
You look like Sundays with my ex
Eating breakfast with your arms across your chest
Like a cross you were my trust around her neck
Till it hung her3Embed

songs.title: Kisses Back

description.plain: The track “Kisses Back” describes a man who decides to take his kisses back from his ex-partner and end the relationship. He wants to return everything related to them, including greetings and goodbyes, morning and evening wishes, and sunrises and moonrises. There are also references to the moments they spent together in the text, but the main message is that the hero no longer wants to be associated with a former partner and wants to end the relationship permanently.

songs.embed_content: Read “Kisses Back” by Matthew Koma on Genius

songs.full_title: Hard to Love by Matthew Koma
songs.title: Hard to Love

description.plain:
“Hard to Love” is from Matthew Koma’s debut studio album.
It’s about the struggles a potential lover would have with his lifestyle, his occupations and implies a promise to change those things for her.

songs.embed_content: Read “Hard to Love” by Matthew Koma on Genius

13 ContributorsHard to Love Lyrics[Verse 1]
I rule the world from my sweat pants
I got a bitchin' collection of headbands
I don't wanna go out and see your friend's band
